section.heading: False statements.
section.text: A person who knowingly makes a false statement in an application, record, report, plan, or other document submitted or maintained under this part shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and subject to a fine not to exceed $10,000, imprisonment not to exceed 6 months, or both. The fines set forth in this section shall not be limited by § 22-3571.01.

annotations.annotation: as added Sept. 9, 2014, D.C. Law 20-135, § 101(b), 61 DCR 6767
